attributes.action: Put Lady Diana Spencer (The People’s Princess, God Rest Her Soul) on all money
attributes.additional_details:
Princess Diana was only member of the Royal Family who was decent, honest, and kind. She is rightfully remembered as the People’s Princess. She stood for many things that those of us in modern Britain, especially in the uncertain times we are living through, could do well to remember. Her work with those suffering from eating disorders (of which she herself was one) and AIDS, among other things, should be given the proper recognition it deserves. 

RIP to the Greatest Queen we never had
attributes.background: When Queen Elizabeth II passes away and the throne passes to Prince Charles, it is not him who should be on OUR money, but the Queen of our hearts, Lady Diana Spencer.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Bank notes are the responsibility of the Bank of England, which is independent of the Government and Parliament.

You can find out how the Bank decides who will be on bank notes here:
https://www.bankofengland.co.uk/banknotes/banknote-characters
